headline: Nike: Too Early To Call A Comeback
summary: Nike (NKE) faces a tough turnaround: wholesale shows gains, but tariffs, weak China demand, and margin pressure persist. Read more analysis here.

headline: NIKE's Turnaround Test: Will Innovation Offset Weak Global Demand?
summary: NKE tests a sport-led innovation reset as uneven global demand persists, aiming to rebuild product credibility and revive growth.

headline: What Analysts Think Is Shifting The Story For Nike (NKE) Now
summary: NIKE’s latest valuation reset has trimmed the central fair value estimate from US$83.30 to US$76.97, even as revenue growth assumptions are set slightly higher and the discount rate stays around 8.89%. This shift mirrors a split Street narrative, where some analysts still see a credible path to profitable growth while others flag slower execution and pressure in areas like Greater China, Converse, and tariffs. Stay with this article to see how you can keep on top of these changing assumptions...

headline: Nike Stock Could Join an Exclusive Club. What to Know About the 'Dividend Aristocrats'
summary: Nike could be set to join an exclusive club of stocks called the dividend aristocrats this year, in a move that could make it more attractive to investors.

headline: lululemon athletica: Activist Interest Reinforces A Mispriced Turnaround Story
summary: lululemon athletica shares are down 50% YoY with a focus on Asia, 2026 European expansion, accelerated buybacks, and activist interest. Read why LULU stock is a buy.

headline: Can Nike Stock Reach $100 in 2026?
summary: Nike bulls are hoping the business can get back to its winning ways soon.

headline: Goldman Sachs Adds Dick’s Sporting Goods (DKS) to US Conviction List After Foot Locker Deal
summary: DICK’S Sporting Goods, Inc. (NYSE:DKS) is included among the 15 Dividend Growth Stocks with the Highest Growth Rates. On January 5, Goldman Sachs analysts added DICK’S Sporting Goods, Inc. (NYSE:DKS) to the firm’s US Conviction List in its monthly update. Goldman said Dick’s acquisition of Foot Locker puts the company “on the front lines” of […]
